5/ How do you build a product roadmap?

a. Create your product strategy

Answer these questions:

-Who is this product for?
-What problem does it solve?
-How is it different from existing solutions?
-What are the objectives/goals?

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
4/ Why do you need a product roadmap?

There are 4 main reasons:
-It offers clear direction for dev teams
-It provides increased visibility
-It reduces the amount of project detours
-It offers a single source of truth🙌

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
3/ Who will own the product roadmap?

Sometimes, there can be different versions owned by different teams.

Most of the time, though, roadmaps are created/managed by a product manager with a goal of communicating the product, its vision, the value, & how to execute!🧠

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
2/ Who needs a product roadmap?

Lots of people benefit from excellent product planning! For example:

-Leadership
-Stakeholders
-Sales
-Marketing
-Development teams
-Other internal teams

Roadmaps are your friend to reduce the risk of bottlenecks.
